General.Name: Shenzhen Institute of Building Research Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Shenzhen Institute of Building Research Co., Ltd. provides green buildings and cities development services in the People's Republic of China. It engages in the architectural design, green building consulting, ecological city planning, EPC, and project management businesses. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People Republic of China.
